sentences.sContent: Work hard to succeed but not to the detriment of others.
sentences.sContent_eng: Work hard to succeed but not to the detriment of others.
sentences.sCn: 在不损害他人利益的前提下为成功艰苦奋斗。

sentences.sContent: A “do what I say, not what I do” world economy will fracture, to the detriment of all.
sentences.sContent_eng: A “do what I say, not what I do” world economy will fracture, to the detriment of all.
sentences.sCn: 在一个“依我所言，勿仿我行”的世界里，世界经济将割裂分化，伤害所有的国家。

words.tran: 有害的人（或物）；不受欢迎的求婚者
